text: Parliamentary elections were held in the People's Republic of Albania on 1 June 1958. The Democratic Front was the only party able to contest the elections, and subsequently won all 188 seats. Voter turnout was reported to be 100%.Nohlen & Stöver, p138 ==Results== {| class=wikitable style=text- align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/- |- |align=left|Democratic Front||778,812||98.82||188||+54 |- |align=left|Non-Front||9,311||1.18||–||– |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes||0||–||–||– |- |align=left|Total||788,123||100||188||+54 |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: Nohlen & Stöver |} ==References== 1958 Category:1958 elections in Europe Category:1958 in Albania Category:One-party elections Category:June 1958 events
title: 1958 Albanian parliamentary election
